functionDecorators.name: tokensOfOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns a list of all Tokens IDs assigned to an address. This method MUST NEVER be called by smart contract code. First, it's fairly expensive but it also returns a dynamic array, which is only supported for web3 calls, and not contract-to-contract calls.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: The owner whose tokens we are interested in.
